title: How to Make Southwestern Style Ramen

steps.headline: Separate the spices from the noodles.
Get your top ramen and crush it up into a bowl.
Fill the bowl with water until the water meets up at the same level as the noodles.
Stick the bowl in the microwave for about 3:00 depending on how your microwave cooks.
When it is done cooking, remove it from the microwave CAREFULLY!
Get a strainer when it cools off and remove of all the water in the bowl.
Get the spices and pour it into your bowl mix them around using a fork.
Get your mayonnaise and put in two spoonfuls of it into the bowl.
Get your hot sauce and put in as much as you'd like.
(Optional) You can also crush up some potato chips (usually cheese flavored) and put it into the bowl as well.
Enjoy!
steps.description: You might also want something to drink!

Get your mayonnaise and put in two spoonfuls of it into the bowl. Mix. Get your hot sauce and put in as much as you'd like. Again, mix.
